title: Bronze to Silv Community
body:
I want to create a fun environment to play with some folks, and always be able to have a full five team.
My dream is that everyone will be serious, but fun, and have a good attitude, no drama whatsoever. 
Anyway onto the interviewish questions.



1.How old are you?
2.What is your main role/champ?
3.Your best quality?
4.Your worst quality?
5.Why would you like to join?
6.What is your timezone?
7.Why do you think you would make a good edition?
8.And finally, your favorite joke?
I hope i find at least a few to join me in a fun league environment!
Oh! and finally our name "Cloudshift"

replies.body:
1.How old are you? 18
2.What is your main role/champ? adc cait
3.Your best quality? I serious 
4.Your worst quality? Eh i don't know. I guess work some days
5.Why would you like to join? Because i wanna have fun!
6.What is your timezone? est
7.Why do you think you would make a good edition? Because i can be funny and love playing league!
8.And finally, your favorite joke? What goes black white black black white...... A penguin rolling down a hill! whats black and white... the penguin that pushed him

> 8.And finally, your favorite joke? What goes black white black black white...... A penguin rolling down a hill! whats black and white... the penguin that pushed him
feel free to add me on LoL we can talk

1.How old are you? 25
2.What is your main role/champ? Support, I like to experiment with unorthodox ones (currently trying out support lulu and lissandra)
3.Your best quality? Packed with peanuts, and a chewy caramel center! (oh wait, that's snickers >< )
4.Your worst quality? "Certain" ADC's don't really mesh with me (ones that push too aggresively and don't upgrade trinkets)
5.Why would you like to join? Too many trolls out there, starting to make this game boring
6.What is your timezone? PST (west coast)
7.Why do you think you would make a good edition? The ideas I bring alone are pure gold, even if they don't exactly "pan out" on the short term.
8.And finally, your favorite joke? Aside from the aristocrats joke? Kinda hard to say...

> 8.And finally, your favorite joke? Aside from the aristocrats joke? Kinda hard to say...

feel free to add me through lol

1. How old are you? 16 yrs
2. What is your main role/champ? mid/katarina (but i mostly fill)
3. Your best quality? I dont rage, probably comes from 3 seasons of playing... xD
4. Your worst quality? quiet when focused.
5. Why would you like to join? I always wanted a team to hang with.
6. What is your time zone? est
7. Why do you think you would make a good edition?! Well at first i might be quiet but then i really think i can communicate and have fun in games, as well as succeed in strategic gameplay.
8. And finally, your favorite joke? If you ever get cold, stand in a corner... theyre usually around 90 dehgrees xD

feel free to add me friend

**1.How old are you?**
twenty-two.
**2.What is your main role/champ?**
fill, but preferences goes: ADC > support > top > jungle > mid.
nami, volibear, and renekton are my favourite champs in general.
**3.Your best quality?**
(overly) positive attitude? i don't know;; sorry.
**4.Your worst quality?**
shyness, self-deprecating, awkward.
**5.Why would you like to join?**
looking for various people to play and have fun with. team is ideal!
**6.What is your timezone?**
est.
**7.Why do you think you would make a good addition?**
i'm not sure if i would. but we can always give it a try. good luck, either way!
**8.And finally, your favorite joke?**
all sorts of terrible puns (volibear guy ^ would be my best friend).

> [{quoted}](name=Menollyhime,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=lKaolf58,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2015-08-21T21:03:42.982+0000)

Feel free to add me and we can do a skype call if you like.

> [{quoted}](name=My Names Walker,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=lKaolf58,comment-id=00080000,timestamp=2015-08-21T21:21:17.447+0000)

> Feel free to add me and we can do a skype call if you like.

okay. o/ added you on league, unsure if you meant skype.

1. 15 
2. Riven/top and Yasuo/mid
3. I can improve play fast (fix mistakes)
4. I can tilt after a few bad games (then I chill and watch youtube/twitch then come back)
5. Most of my friends only play league 2-4 times a week and I want other people to play with
6. EST
7. I have good communication and can adapt to game situations ( and MOST importantly, I ALWAYS upgrade my trinket)
8. Police: where do u live?
    Me: with my parents
    Police: where does ur parents live?
    Me: with me
    Police: where do u all live?
    Me: together
    Police: where is ur house?
    Me: next to my neighbors house
    Police: where is your neighbors house?
    Me: if i tell you u wont believe me.
    Police: tell me
    Me: next to my house

> 1.How old are you? 24
> 2.What is your main role/champ? don't really have one. just play whoever.
> 3.Your best quality? all the qualities
> 4.Your worst quality? modesty
> 5.Why would you like to join? cause i want friends forever
> 6.What is your timezone? est
> 7.Why do you think you would make a good edition? i'm calm the collected.
> 8.And finally, your favorite joke?
penguins driving his penguin car and notices a strange sound, so he takes it to mechanic. as the mechanic is looking it over penguin goes next door to 7-11 and buys an ice-cream but because he has no fingers gets the ice cream all over his beak on the way back to the mechanics. when he gets there the mechanic says "looks like you blew a seal." penguin says no, that's ice cream."

1.How old are you? 14
2.What is your main role/champ? ADC/Jg  Jinx, Vayne, Graves (Still learning Draven and Ashe before taking them to ranked) Lee Sin, Jarvan IV, Sejuani, Vi
3.Your best quality? Humour
4.Your worst quality? Social Awkwardness
5.Why would you like to join? I would like to join because lately I've been looking for a bunch of people to climb the ranked team ladder with since I arent a massive fan of SoloQ
6.What is your timezone? Australian EST
7.Why do you think you would make a good edition? I believe that I would make a good edition because i'm a confident player and usually win my lane in most games. Also I'm comfortable in calling shots for the team.
8.And finally, your favorite joke? The fiora rework

1.How old are you? 15
2.What is your main role/champ? I play support nautilus 
3.Your best quality? being able to keep a positive attitude even the dump
4.Your worst quality? once i lose that positive attitude i lose it
5.Why would you like to join? im always looking for friends to play with! :D
6.What is your timezone? EST
7.Why do you think you would make a good edition? most of the time im fun to hangout with 
8.And finally, your favorite joke? chroma packs
